column1: convict him for culpable homicide not amounting to murder in terms of section
As considered above, I am of the view that the act committed by the appellant
had  been  an  act  done  with  the  knowledge  that  it  is  likely  to  cause  death  but
without any intention to cause death, or to cause such bodily injury as is likely
Therefore, acting in terms of the second limb of section 297 of the Penal Code, I
sentence  the  appellant  for  a  rigorous  imprisonment  period  of  10  years.  In
addition, I order him to pay a fine of Rs. 25000/=, and in default, he shall serve
an additional rigorous imprisonment period of 2 years.
The appeal is allowed up to the above extent.
